Posts.Content: punkyandjohnnasmom wrote: Tomorrow afternoon I go to meet my oncologist.  He has come VERY highly recommended, which helps with my nerves.  I'm not sure what to expect exactly and am looking for some insight.  I do know he should have all of my test/scan results (bone scan, MRI, labs). I want to be prepared and walk out feeling like we are moving forward.  What should I be asking?  Or should I be a sponge and listen and absorb? I hope you all know how much I appreciate all the advice, compassion, insight and support I have gotten from you all!!  You are the ones who are making this time so much easier, and I thank you from the bottom of my heart!! Shannon Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 1st appt w/oncologist, what to ask and expect? punkyandjohnnasmom vivirasselena
